about_the_game:
Hi everyone, we are pleased to announce OPG: Clan Wars Supporter Pack. This is a set of additional plushies for people who want to support the developers and participate in the development of the OPG: Clan Wars project.

The OPG: Clan Wars Supporter Pack includes the following digital items:
A unique set of skins:
AK-74M
AKMS
Sayga
VAl
VSK-94
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support!
detailed_description:
Hi everyone, we are pleased to announce OPG: Clan Wars Supporter Pack. This is a set of additional plushies for people who want to support the developers and participate in the development of the OPG: Clan Wars project.

The OPG: Clan Wars Supporter Pack includes the following digital items:
A unique set of skins:

AKMS

VAl
VSK-94
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: This content requires the base game OPG: Clan Wars on Steam in order to play
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Japanese
